message:
Use /shop to visit our online shop.
With /spawn, you will be teleported to the spawn.

<gray>[<aqua><bold>Shop</bold></aqua>] Our online shop<dark_gray>: <yellow><click:open_url:https://www.myserver.shop><hover:show_text:"<gray>Click here to go to the online shop.">myserver.shop</hover></click></yellow>
